Table.text1: If 【CAKE-BNB】 swap price is 【lower】/【higher】than 【200】 BNB by the expiration date, you will earn DPR 【3%】 earning without risk.

IIO.InitialOffering: Initial Offering을 재정의 할 수 있는 옵션
IIO.Pool: {name} Initial Offering Pool for HELMET-BNB LPers
IIO.ActionOne: {name} 티켓을 지불한 다음 LPT를 스테이킹 하여 당신의 지분(i토큰)을 받으세요.
IIO.CanGetReward: {time}전에 {name}을 바꾸거나 보유하는 정책 탭에서 i토큰을 활성화 할 수 있습니다.
IIO.Details_title1: 어떻게 하면 IIO 토큰을 구할 수 있습니까?
IIO.Details_text1: 거래 후 보험 탭 또는 IIO탭의 IIO토큰으로 활성화/교환할 수 있는 교환 가능한 I토큰을 가져옵니다.
IIO.Details_text2: 이 스왑에는 BUSD/BNB/HELMET과 같은 기본 토큰이 필요합니다.
IIO.Details_title2: 어떻게 하면 i토큰을 구할 수 있습니까?
IIO.Details_text6: IIO 참여자들이 사용한 티켓(HELMET)은 영원히 소각될 것입니다.
IIO.Details_title4: 새로운 IIO토큰을 받으면 HELMET-BNB LP를 잃게 되나요?
IIO.Details_text7: HELMET팀은 LPT 지분만 스캔하여 i토큰을 계산하기 때문에 풀의 LPT에는 영향을 미치지 않습니다.
IIO.Details_text8: 게다가 IIO 기간에는 HELMET-BNB LP 풀의 이중 보상을 즐기실 수 있습니다.
IIO.Details_text9: i토큰 분배 메커니즘은 기본적으로 HELMET-BNB 풀에 더 많은 LPT가 있을수록 더 많은 i토큰을 얻을 수 있습니다.
IIO.Details_text10: 사용자는 IIO에 원하는 만큼 가입할 수 있으며, i토큰의 최종 할당은 IIO 종료 시 다른 사용자가 입력한 LPT의 백분율로 보유한 LPT의 양을 기준으로 합니다.
IIO.Details_text11: 만약 다른 사람이 약정 한 총 금액에 비해 LP토큰의 양이 매우 적다면, 당신의 기여는 총액에서 매우 작은 부분이 될 수 있습니다.
IIO.Details_text12: 판매 전: 1.HELMET 및 BNB 토큰을 구입합니다, 2.HELMET 및 BNB 유동성을 추가하여 HELEMT-BNB LP 토큰을 얻습니다.;
IIO.Details_text13: 판매 중: 1.판매가 진행되는 동안 IIO 티켓의 PAY로 이동합니다, 2. HELMET-BNB LP 토큰을 약정 또는 추가하여 i토큰(IIO 지분) 마이닝을 시작합니다. ;
IIO.Details_text14: 판매 후: 세일이 완료되면 1개를 판매하실 수 있습니다 1. i토큰을 교환합니다, 2. i토큰을 활성화하여 IIO토큰을 교환합니다(이 교환을 완료하려면 지갑에 BNB, HELMET또는 BUSD와 같이 필요한 기본 토큰을 충분히 준비해야 합니다.)

NFT.Text1: Do you have {card_Name} NFT prize Card? Join in Helmet gacha game, and swap cards with me! 8 NFT cards could scroop $奖池数字 jackpot; Click here:
NFT.Text2: Please recheck the address before you send cards. This transaction is non-retreatable and Helmet will not be held responsible for any losses. You will send {card_Name} NFT
NFT.NFT_TIP1: If you didn't claim your cards, PLZ  refresh and wait until 'Check my 10 cards' →'re-claim your cards' button shows.
NFT.NFT_TIP2: Please 'claim your cards' in 5min otherwise you will lose them.

Tip.Active2: 헬멧 팀은 이 일에 대한 당신의 손실을 보상하지 않습니다.
Tip.SendCoin: 이 스마트 계약 주소로 헬멧을 전송하지 말고 지갑을 연결하여 BSC 네트워크로 변경하세요.
Tip.RiskWarningContent: 만약 당신이 헬멧 인슈어 신규 사용자인 경우 거래 위험 및 옵션 거래 논리에 대해 명확히 이해하기 전에 어떠한 정책도 거래하지 마세요, 계속하기 전에 '사용지침서'섹션을 읽어보시기 바랍니다.
Tip.BurnTip1: 새로운 젬에 대한 만료된 정책 소각.
Tip.BurnTip2: 소각 기간 동안 풀 지분에 따라 새로운 젬을 얻을 수 있습니다.
Tip.FlashTip1: 플래시 마이닝은 단기 정책 채굴 캠페인입니다.
Tip.FlashTip2: 만료 날짜를 통지하여 다른 정책을 파밍할 수 있습니다.
Tip.MiningTip2: 전용 헬멧 토큰을 파밍하거나 다른 유동성 공급자 토큰을 스테이킹하여 콤보 보상을 받을 수 있습니다. (LPTs)
Tip.IIOTip2: New assets distribution model with European option logic.
Tip.EarnTip1: Daily income withdrawal and manual reinvestment.
Tip.EarnTip2: The return on compound interest will get higher and higher over time.
Tip.MiningTip3: Claim your XMS rewards on Mars ecosystem. The XMS reward is based on 180 days linear vesting. Vesting once every 3 days.

Migration.StakeTitle: Stake HELMET-BNB LPT to get GUARD credits
Migration.Jump: You will swich to guard.insure in {number}s (to claim GUARD)
Migration.Tips1: STAKING in HELMET-BNB LP Mining Pool to get GUARD credits reward;
Migration.Tips2: Daily GUARD credits distribution hard cap: 10,000 . Your credits are based on your LPT share in the pool;
Migration.Tips3: You should claim your GUARD credits before using it.
Migration.Tips4: To get GUARD, you need to burn corresponding amount of HELMET;
Migration.Tips5: Daily burning hard cap: 10,000 HELMET. (Update at 22:00 SGT daily)
Migration.Tips7: New polygon dev plan in!!!  Better&healthier bridge approach rush on its way and your GUARD Credits are still valid!!!
Migration.Tips8: Tips: 2,000 Helmet limit per address, hardcap 100,000 Helmet,FCFS.
Migration.Tips9: Tips2: You will get GUARD in the same wallet address (reset the network to polygon) after 14:00

IBO.IBO_text25: IBO: Mini IBO with 50% HELMET raising fund burnt.
IBO.IBO_text26: You need to prepare HELMET to get the IBO share.
IBO.IBO_text27: Disclaimer — All projects are subject to both high market risk and volatility. Projects from IBO part might witness high risk and Please, do your own research and full due diligence before even considering to invest your funds in any project and please, make your investments very cautiously. Helmet will not be held responsible for any investment losses.
IBO.IBO_text49: Notice the uncertaintity of {token} IBO since the 1 month token lock-up. Helmet will not be held responsible for any investment losses.

Governance.Tips1: Helmet Government,'stake' is voting：after choosing the specific iterm, stake your HELMET to vote. You could get your HELMET back after the proposal stettled.
Governance.Tips2: You could get your HELMET back after the proposal stettled. You will get HELMET rewards showing in Mining tab Helmet Governance in the staking period.
Governance.Tips4: You could get HELMET rewards during voting period.

Dialogs.WaitText1: You will supply {symbol}({type}) Policy with Pledged asset: {volume} {collateral} ; Activated Price: {strikeprice} {underlying} ; Expected premium gaining: {price}  HELMET ; Expire date: {expiry}.
Dialogs.InsuranceTip1: You will lose your token if you supply the policy since {name} has hit the activate price.

Governance1.text1: About the plan of the 50% lock-up HELMET.
Governance1.text2: Helmet is positioning itself as a long-term infrastructure platform that benefits projects and blockchain ecosystems. In the first 3 quarters of 2021, Helmet has positively invoked the Vault to support policy mining, community rewards, as well as investment acquirement, making the Options protocol a profitable mining and entertainment system.
Governance1.text3: Here is the recap of our progress:
Governance1.text4: As the roadmap showing, Helmet will focus on proposal about the remaining lock-up HELMET to pave the path of 2022. Derivates on-chain have improved by leaps and bounds, correspondingly, the trading of derivatives has been more user-friendly. At this time, We would like to let our helmeters in the promount decision settlemet during Q4, with Helmet token used. including token incentives, payments or additional development funds.
Governance1.text5: We will continue to work around the clock so that we can keep rapidly scaling on BSC & Polygon. Then, and with efforts already well underway, we will be repeating the same formula for our success on new blockchains!
Governance1.text6: In this situation, we initial 2 proposals, not the final deal by all means, to be final settled through governance functionality with all helmeters in.
Governance1.text7: Proposal1: 50,000,000 locked HELMET will be burnt forever, cutting down the total supply to 50,000,000.
Governance1.text8: Deflation of HELMET will technically promote the circulationg value.
Governance1.text9: The Circulating Supply of HELMET has reached 39,809,145(From CoinMarketCap), and 1,122,336 of them have been burnt. In the upcoming Q4 and 2022, there will be more scenarios of HELMET burning, including the ongoing IBO, GUARD ecosystem incentives, and the upcoming NFT Game and Options Exchange ( details in Medium story).
Governance1.text10: It means that HELMET will carry out more TOKEN burning measures, continuously benefit holders without fazing business incentives, and actively fulfill the demands of holders who would like to make contributions to the community.
Governance1.text11: If a majority of HELMET holders are in favor of this proposal, we will build the helmet committee and launch the governance tab where the details are determined by our supporters. The specific governance functionality will be online by December 31, 2021.
Governance1.text12: Proposal2: 50,000,000 locked HELMET will be used for the Options exchange: Layer2 DEX and NFT Game incentive.
Governance1.text13: Helmet has deployed V1.5 on BSC and Polygon, allowing users to trade options on crypro assets via price insurance on-chain. We believe the potential of Layer-2, including absolute security and performance improvements from ZK-rollup.
Governance1.text14: Therefore, HELMET will take the instructure frame of Zks for our own Layer2 dev. Over the past 2 months, the Core Team has successfully made the latest version of the Event Sourcing Engine frame, which is expected to generate at least 300,000 TPS within 70ms, maintaining state of the art security and anti-attack capabilities. All the users' assets, positions and attributes will be stored in the Memory Database, and record the declaration and matching in the form of events. (details in Medium story)
Governance1.text15: Helmet's Layer-2 is going to be tested gradually with the EVM adaptation, which we expect to be completed by mid-December 2021.
Governance1.text16: With the heat of DYDX in futures, we believe that the incentive is also an essential way to approch to Defi users.
Governance1.text17: Thus, if the locked 50,000,000 HELMET could be used as the Layer2 and NFT Game incentive, the fresh new protocol is more likely to aquire the initial motivation.
Governance1.text18: If there are most votes in favor of this proposal, we will build a community committee and launch a governance functionality where the details of the destruction will be determined by helmeters. The specific governance tab will live by December 31, 2021.
